page.title: 19A Saturday in Ruan Minor
page.content: On Saturday I like to get up early to get breakfast for myself. Then I feel ill and go back to bed again.I wake up again and I go to put the television on. I watch Saturday Picture Show which has pop stars on it and funny cartoons. Then I wait till my gran is up.I don't need to get up in the morning for school as there is none on Saturday. In the day time I play in the village with some boys. Afterwards I go home and watch television until we have dinner. Later I go back down the village to go fishing at Poltesco.Sometimes I play football in the recreation ground. We call it the rec. for short. About 7p.m. I go home to have some tea. On television I watch Dynasty which is about an oil company and I watch World of Sport.
